summary: THE VEHICLE EXPERIENCED A PROBLEM WITH THE RACK AND PINION AS STATED IN A PREVIOUS RECALL, HOWEVER THE YEAR OF CONSUMER'S VEHICLE WAS NOT INCLUDED.  *JB  PLEASE REFER TO RECALL #02V286000.  THE MANUFACTURER DID NOT INCLUDE THIS VEHICLE.  THE STEERING HAD GONE OUT  AS THE CONSUMER WAS DRIVING AND MADE IT IMPOSSIBLE FOR THE CONSUMER TO STEER.  *SCC
